short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate repetitive work that fits in tables.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manaflow AI Chrome Extension

Use this extension to connect LinkedIn and other 3rd party integrations to Manaflow.

Manaflow empowers operation managers to automate workflows involving data analysis, API calls, and business actions. With English, you can command Manaflow agents to execute recurring tasks and manage them on a spreadsheet interface.

Learn more: https://manaflow.com
